nodes.text: The Republic Sienar Systems Star Courier was a small transport design with a limited production run.

The most famous of these ships was the Scimitar, a modified vessel that was designed for a mysterious client, later revealed to have been the Sith Lord Darth Sidious. It was given to his apprentice, Darth Maul, and later on, Sidious's second apprentice, Darth Tyranus. After the end of the Clone Wars, the vessel was taken by Emperor Palpatine and given to the Inquisitor Valin Draco.

Other vessels were in use by several darksiders over the years, with the Dathomiri Nightsister Yansu Grjak using one during the Clone Wars. The Dark Jedi Garth Ezzar also owned one. Emperor Palpatine owned one during the Ghost Prison incident.
